类型: Color: 101-silver, Gradient Light BurgundyLens Width: 58 Millimeters
评论详情: Wore these sunglasses  once. Rubber nose guard came off sometime during wear and lost.  My other sunglasses have a wire top frame to stabilize and the rubber pierces are screwed on. Much higher quality. These have no top frame and the rubber nose guards are wedged between two pieces of the frame so no wonder  one came off. Bought another pair with the top frame and reinforced rubber guards for less money at Ross.  Returning as they are poor quality so I cannot recommend  these, sorry. Loved the gold light color but that is all that is a plus for glasses.

Right out of the box without any adjusting to the nose pads or frame this pair fit my face perfectly.  With UV400 protection I couldn't be more pleased.  You see I wear Maui Jim dark sunglasses most of the time here in Nevada during the day, but evenings are different.  I wear contact lenses and there are cacti plants that spawn tiny microscopic spherical pollens with needles that when they get into my eyes, SHRED the contact lenses like razors!  Can't tell you how many contacts I've lost due to this.  So wearing protective eye wear is necessary for me at certain times of the year in Nevada.  These Fresh Minimalist glasses are terrific.

They’re some of the only rimless, barely there glasses I’ve been able to find. I can wear them without making people feel shut out. It’s so easy to slap them off of your face. MUST keep them in a case. Not durable. You’ve gotta be so gentle with them and plan to only wear while sitting and chillin’! The ones I have are warped. For how fragile they are, the price seriously needs to come down.
